page.title: 14Religion
page.content: St. Mary's Church at Nevill Holt is no longer a Parish Church but owned by the adjoining school. A senior master conducts an informal service every week day for pupils and staff and a service is held every Sunday, sometimes conducted by a lay preacher or visiting Rector. There are no regular services during school holidays. Drayton has the smallest church in Leicestershire. A Chapelry of Bringhurst, services are held twice monthly, alternating Communion and Evensong. Besides St.Giles Church at Medbourne there is a Congregational Chapel where afternoon services are held but are sparsely attended. There is a small regular attendance at all these churches with a greater number at Christmas,Easter and Harvest
